description: A man is hanging from the ceiling, appearing to be stuck to flypaper alongside several flies. A woman below him is speaking to him in a seemingly annoyed manner. The absurd image of a human treated like an insect caught on a trap, combined with the woman's casual accusation of him 'buzzing around,' creates a surreal and darkly humorous scenario, treating a bizarre predicament with mundane domestic irritation.
caption: “So! You’ve been buzzing around the living room again, haven’t you?”
